channel.title: Ficsit-Networks :: FactoryHook
channel.description:
https://docs.ficsit.app/ficsit-networks/0.0.1/lua/api/Inventory.html#_factoryhook
Anyone know how to use this? Not seeing any exposed functions on instances, nor samples in lua documentation. getInventory() on FactoryConnector appears to be non functional, making this incredibly important to reliably track throughput on conveyers.
I'm doing it manually right now using computer.millis() to calculate it myself, but it takes a toll on frame rate when used at global scale. Would really like to use FactoryHook.... Any ideas?

item.title: Ficsit-Networks :: FactoryHook
item.dc:creator: @ensemblebd Ensemblebd
item.description:
@ensemblebd wrote:

docs.ficsit.app

Inventory API :: Satisfactory Modding Documentation

The Inventory API allows you to interact with ingame inventories.

Anyone know how to use this? Not seeing any exposed functions on instances, nor samples in lua documentation.
getInventory() on FactoryConnector appears to be non functional, making this incredibly important to reliably track throughput on conveyers.

I’m doing it manually right now using computer.millis() to calculate it myself, but it takes a toll on frame rate when used at global scale.
Would really like to use FactoryHook… Any ideas?

Read full topic
